name: Hilsha Fish Curry
description: Spicy and tangy Bengali fish curry made with marinated Hilsha fish, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Beef Bhuna
description: A spicy and aromatic South Asian dish made with marinated beef, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of spices, often served with naan or rice.

name: Chicken Biriyani
description: A flavorful South Asian rice dish made with spiced chicken and fragrant basmati rice, often served with raita and/or curry.
